response.overview: For eight years the Samoan Submission Machine obliterated every obstacle in his path to become a Champion. From the X Division to Heavyweight Champion, this unstoppable force blazed a path across the ring like few have ever done. Slammiversary 2005- Samoa Joe vs Sonjay Dutt Unbreakable 2005- Samoa Joe vs AJ Styles vs Christopher Daniels Bound For Glory 2005- Samoa Joe vs Jushin Thunder Liger Lockdown 2008- Samoa Joe vs Kurt Angle Slammiversary 2008- King of The Mountain Match No Surrender 2008- Samoa Joe vs Booker T vs Kurt Angle vs Christian Cage Sacrifice 2009- Samoa Joe vs Kevin Nash No Surrender 2009- Samoa Joe vs Christopher Daniels No Surrender 2010- Samoa Joe and Jeff Jarrett vs Kevin Nash and Sting Also featuring: Chris Sabin, Kaz, Scott Steiner, Booker T and more
response.title: The Essentials Samoa Joe Collection
